div.head: 傷寒少陰證
div.div: harm caused by cold with signs in the minor yin section

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: harm caused by cold with signs in the minor yin section

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with shao yin shang han 少陰傷寒 , harm in the minor yin section caused by cold. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 25: 治傷寒少陰證嘔噦者，四逆湯加生薑方 , “To cure harm caused by cold with signs in the minor yin section with vomiting, [use] the recipe for the ‘decoction for counterflow in the four [limbs] amended by raw ginger”.
